text: Kamil Čapkovič (; born 2 June 1986) is a professional Slovak tennis player. He was born in Michalovce, Slovak Republic. ==Career== Čapkovič has spent most of his time on the Futures and Challenger circuits, where he has won several Futures titles. ==Singles Titles == {|class=wikitable !Legend (Singles) |-bgcolor=e5d1cb |Grand Slam (0) |-bgcolor=ffffcc |Tennis Masters Cup (0) |-bgcolor=silver |ATP Masters Series (0) |-bgcolor=dfe2e9 |ATP Tour (0) |-bgcolor=moccasin |Challengers (0) |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |Futures (14) |} {|class=wikitable !No. !Date !Tournament !Surface !Opponent !Score |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |1. |June 14, 2004 |Koper |Clay | Javier Garcia-Sintes |6–7(5–7), 7–6(7–3), 6–4 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |2. |June 14, 2005 |Belgrade |Clay | Max Raditschnigg |6–2, 6–2 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |3. |June 19, 2006 |L'Aquila |Clay | Lukáš Lacko |6–2, 7–6(8–6) |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |4. |September 4, 2006 |Gliwice |Clay | Denis Matsukevich |6–4, 6–1 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |5. |September 1, 2008 |Vienna |Clay | Michal Tabara |3–6, 7–6(7–3), 6–2 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |6. |October 13, 2008 |Lagos |Hard | Ilya Belyaev |6–3, 6–2 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |7. |October 20, 2008 |Lagos |Hard | Divij Sharan |6–4, 4–6, 6–4 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |8. |November 24, 2008 |Libreville |Hard | Petru-Alexandru Luncanu |7–5, 6–4 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |9. |March 10, 2009 |Faro |Hard | Armin Sandbichler |3–6, 6–4, 6–0 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |10. |June 29, 2009 |Bologna |Clay | Stefano Galvani |6–7(4–7), 6–3, 6–1 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |11. |March 1, 2011 |Faro |Hard | Pedro Sousa |6–4, 3–6, 6–2 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |12. |October 24, 2011 |Lagos |Hard | Vijayant Malik |6–2, 7–5 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |13. |July 23, 2013 |Michalovce |Clay | Juraj Masár |6–4, 3–6, 6–3 |-bgcolor=CFFCFF |14. |August 6, 2013 |Trnava |Clay | Adrian Sikora |7–6(7–5), 7–5 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male tennis players Category:People from Michalovce
